Beef only today, No chicken. They kept me hydrated with watered down margarita and lemon water. Ask for posole but they tried giving me manudo. More of a bar than a restaurant. My first visit wasn’t good.
I love the atmosphere; the open air, comfortable seating and friendly staff. I'm excited to come back!

So the food was pretty good, I got the carne asada street tacos. The meat was a bit chewy but we'll seasoned. The rice and beans portions we're small for the price but the street tacos do come 6 to an order.  However the amount of time …

Great time at la perla! Ordered mango habanero Wings and the patty melt, came out at once and the wings were very delicious with the patty melt being just a good. Service was quick, Great restaurant definitely going back.

I loved it, delicious and traditional , it just opened and they are already striving. Very beautiful atmosphere and service, you can tell they worked very hard for the restaurant and i love the decorations , it reminds me of a fancy restaurant in Mexico , definitely recommend!!

Great new place in downtown Glendale.  The food is delicious and the staff is very helpful.  The drinks  are cold and tasty.  The environment is very open and inviting.  I ordered the patty melt and it was thick, I shared it with my foodie …
This place is awesome! Great food and great drinks. Service was outstanding and overall a great experience.!!
Amazing people in this location ! Truly great service! It’s a big thumbs up 👍🏻 A BIG MUST to come and visit for a bite !
Took an hour to get food, it was cold, gristly, and the breakfast menu item was raw.  Disappointed, had high hopes.
Very slow service and the food was limited and not very tasty.  Will not return or recommend. Asked for a star to rate so picked one star but not worth one.
Went to have breakfast was excited to try a new place. They sat us down, sat for 20-30 minutes no one came to offer any drinks or take our order. So we just left, was very disappointed.

Great place to hang out and eat some food. Great happy hr specials mon-fri 3p-7p. Came in for the "this Saturday only special" they had $3mimosas $5 bloody mary and micheladas. It was wild city. Not to mention the 4.99$ plates. I got the juevos rancheros
Came in for this Saturday only deal from 6-10am and It was bomb diggity.  Had some $3 mimosas and juevos rancheros. Definitely a good time

The only resemblance to the long-standing original restaurant is the name.   We went hungry for chili verde.  On that second day open they had only an abbreviated menu, no chili red or green.  The so called chicken tacos had unspiced, …
Nice little spot! Had a great drink! Warm environment
Services excellent..  Food not that great for the price

I love love the Cantina atmosphere!  They always have some great house bests going.. I was there for their grand opening.. DJ’s playing awesome music all day long! It was standing room only Friday!  Definitely share and bring all my friends and family!   Can’t wAit for their breakfast !
Love the new vibe off the downtown Glendale strip!! It’s where to be!
Nice place great servers and good food. Can’t wait until they expand the menu 👌😁

Amazing food! Amazing Staff! The name La Perla is a Glendale icon. Great to have the La Perla name back with an outstanding new atmosphere! Way to kick off the grand opening with DJ Alex Santa Maria! Our new favorite spot in Downtown Glendale!! Them Mango habanero wings are amazing!!
Great service and great food, cant wait for football season to spend my sundays there..
This place is the best! They have the best selection of food, my favorite thing to order is the carne asada tacos. The service is amazing and the vibe here is spectacular!
Great atmosphere with awesome music. The service was attentive and quick. The food was amazing! You have to try the Chimis

We had really high Hopes for this place. We went in last Thursday and just about everything was wrong. We started with the queso dip as an appetizer, it came out cold and tasted like a jar of queso. We ordered a cheese crisp, but received a …

The service is great. Bartender is very attentive and helpful.  The food is also great. Burger is juicy, the fries are crispy. You get a good amount of fries too!  The beer selection is really solid, and it comes cold.  The atmosphere is …

We had a great time but not much of a selection on the menu.  Our waiter Anthony was very attentive and  courteous..  they also had a DJ playing great music we got to dance there so we had lots of fun great grand opening.

Needs some work. I understand this was their soft opening - didn't know that until I sat down however. Took a bit for someone to wait on us, drinks took a while - the house margarita that didn't taste like it had much tequila at all. Menu …

Love the vibe here at La Perla sports catina. I had the mango habanero wings let me say they are  tasty and  just enough spice.Also had there patty melt very good,. portion were good at reasonable price.Would highly recommend.
Love the atmosphere and the owners are amazing!
Great food. Drinks and nice staff
Street tacos are delicious, atmosphere is great highly recommend this place.
EXCELLENT music , good service  , food  .!!!

Food is awful. Frozen everything . Cheese crisp is not crispy.  House margheritta was watered down and no flavor. Don't bother going here. Good locating and nice inside but don't bother going for food or drink.
Great service! Friendly employees treated me like family!

What a great place! It was welcoming and upbeat! Our waitress, hanna, was awesome and most workers were doing their best! The bar Mgr didn't look very happy though. It's brand new and I'm sure they will work out some kinks-- suggestions: …
The BEST Friday yet! Fabulous staff!!! Great atmosphere! The DJ was off the hook! Can’t wait to go back!
Great atmosphere, great tacos, wonderful staff!! La Perla was a good way to start out my day! ❤️👍🏼

What an amazing place!!! Great food, great music and great service!!!  I am new to Arizona and this was the best night that I have had since moving here.  I could have not asked for a better Friday night.  I will definitely be back.  I highly recommend it!
Best place in Glendale..... Great music,  great atmosphere  and great service over all! I highly recommend this place!
New place in downtown Glendale.  Lots of outdoor seating to people watch, the salsa is a must have, made in house!

My family and I had such a great time! We are excited that there’s finally a place in Downtown Glendale that has good food and great night life! The atmosphere, staff and music, it was all great. Downtown Glendale needed this! Excited to see that La Pearls is back!

This place is great! They have a live DJ tonight that is playing an awesome mix of old school and new music, really chill environment. I got the fish and chips and my 5yo son (who’s picky!) devoured his food! We’re absolutely coming back!!

The good, Great location great atmosphere..........the bad indoor metal seats are really hard no cushions hard on the back. the asada burrito was not that good, the wait time was 25 minutes for food and we didnt get silverware, the waiters …

The wait staff was terrible. Took 20 minutes just for an order of onion rings. Where  I got my drink the waitress didn't even give me my straw. Then when they finally gave me my check, they took another 10 minutes just to pick it up, and …
